Title: Bail Out
Plot: Mike's life becomes complicated when an old friend reappears and needs his help. Harvey must decide between closing a multi-million dollar deal and helping his trusted driver defend himself against a law suit.
ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
GuestStars: Tom Lipinski, Harvey Atkin, Jose Zuniga, Susan Saint James, Ivan Martin, Anand Rajaram, Julian DeZotti
